pkgmetadata.longdescription: Conditional Least Squared (CLS) Method for the Model SINAR(1,1) // Implementation of the Conditional Least Square (CLS) estimates and its covariance matrix for the first-order spatial integer-valued autoregressive model (SINAR(1,1)) proposed by Ghodsi (2012) doi:10.1080/03610926.2011.560739.
